title: Sengoku Basara
alternative_title: Sengoku Basara: Samurai Kings, 戦国BASARA
description: Sengoku jidai crowd hacking game Sengoku Basara (or Devil Kings) is set for anime adaptation, with the conversion to be handled by Production IG.The characters in the game are mostly daimyo, and it seems the anime follows suit, with the announced characters having the same seiyuu as the game version (which had an all star cast).
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Samurai>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
